title: Steak Bites Fajitas
instructions: Cut the planted.steak into bite-sized cubes. Season generously with cumin, chili powder, smoked paprika, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
Heat a cast-iron skillet until smoking hot. Sear the steak bites in batches, cooking 2-3 minutes until deeply caramelized on all sides.
Slice bell peppers (red, yellow, green) and onions into strips. Saut√© in the same pan over high heat until slightly charred but still crisp, about 4-5 minutes.
Return the steak bites to the pan and squeeze fresh lime juice over everything. Toss to combine.
Warm flour tortillas in a dry pan or directly over a gas flame until pliable and lightly charred.
Serve the sizzling steak and peppers family-style with warm tortillas, guacamole, sour cream, fresh salsa, and cilantro.
